reference_summary:
JOYYUM 1000W 2-in-1 Hot Air Spin Brush Styler Auto-rotating Negative Ionic Hair Curler Dryer Brush, 1 1/2 Inch and 2 Inch Brush Attachments, Lavander Fog
JOYYUM
{'Brand': 'JOYYUM', 'Material': 'Titanium', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Special Feature': 'Comb, Portable, Massage, Hot', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Curling', 'Package Dimensions': '16.3 x 5.4 x 3.2 inches; 1.85 Pounds', 'UPC': '787414814279', 'Manufacturer': 'JOYYUM'}
I have mixed feelings about this dryer.  It does a nice job over all but has some problems.  It takes a bit for it to heat up and would take forever to actually dry wet hair. It works well on lightly damp hair.  It has a button that spins the barrel different direction and it’s quite easy to use, but the motor to turn the barrel isn’t very strong and it take a bit to get going.  My biggest complaint is the sound.  It is very loud with a high pitched wail this is especially problematic because you use it right next to your ear.
Very loud.
Embryolisse Eau de Beaute Rosamelis Face Toner, 6.76 Fl Oz
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.85 x 2.76 x 7.44 inches; 8.11 Ounces', 'Item model number': '501000', 'Manufacturer': 'Embryolisse'}
This is great toner. The scent is nice and it leaves my face feeling fresh and clean.
Nice scent

Foot Peel Mask For Cracked Heels, Dead Skin & Calluses - Make Your Feet Baby Soft & Get a Smooth Skin, Removes & Repairs Rough Heels
Monikahair
{'UPC': '739515020639'}
Wow! This foot peel is amazing. My feet are very calloused and dry and this works extremely well. I used this on a Wednesday and by Saturday my feet were starting to peel, by Sunday the were peeling a lot all over. Make sure you’re feet don’t need to be seen for a few days while they are in the peeling stage. It took 3 days for them to finish peeling, but now they look and feel so much better.
Amazing
CIBBCCI Eyeshadow Makeup Palette 16 Colors Pigmented Velvet Texture Blendable Neutral Warm Long Lasting Eye Shadow Pallet With Mirror
CIBBCCI
{'Color': 'Multicolor', 'Brand': 'CIBBCCI', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Long lasting', 'Package Dimensions': '4.9 x 4.9 x 0.6 inches; 0.73 Ounces', 'UPC': '718689217120'}
This is a great pallet. The colors are highly pigmented so a little goes a long way. The powder feels light and smooth and is long lasting. The colors are so versatile and you can do many looks from day to evening, light and natural to dark and smokey. It also looks great on stage.
Versatile
minihope Women's Elastic Hair Tiea, Black, 120 Count (Pack of 1), 4MM for Medium Hair.Value pack.
minihope
{'Material': 'Metal', 'Item Form': 'elastic', 'Brand': 'minihope', 'Hair Type': 'Medium, Thick', 'Number of Pieces': '120', 'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 2.9 x 2.2 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'ET-SET-200703', 'UPC': '725683672763 661757097431'}
These are great elastics.  They are sturdy and thick. They don’t snag or tangle on your hair and hold up for a long time. We go thrift them quick with 3 girls in the house so this pack is a great value for the money.
Great value
3D Mask Bracket - Internal Support Holder Frame Nose Breathing Smoothly- Lipstick Protection Cool Mask Bracket - DIY Face Mask Accessories - 5Pcs (L-Adult)
Vedory
['❤-Outfits Set Include: 1 pack of 5 3D mask bracket (not including mask or cloth, etc.). ❤-Size: about 10*9*4.2cm / 3.9*3.51*1.64 inches, enough space for various masks. ❤-Unique design: designed to fit the face of the nose bridge, breathing more smoothly, breathable and not stuffy. ❤-Ideal Saver for Makeup - It makes the mask not to stick lipstick, protecting your perfect makeup from being messed up.If you wear glasses, 3D Inner Bracket can also prevent the lens from fogging because of more breathing space. ❤ 3D Inner Bracket also suitable for various ma-sks.Using double sided tape or thread to fasten the silicone frame onto the mask can make it work better.']
{'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 4.72 x 2.36 inches; 1.41 Ounces', 'UPC': '800914455053', 'Manufacturer': 'Vedory'}
Theses are lightweight and fairly comfortable and are great for teachers or sales clerks or anyone who needs to talk a lot for their job.  They can clip on to your mask, or can just sit inside of it.  They are very lightweight and hold the mask comfortably away from your face for easier talking.
Great for talkers

Spa-Da
{'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'Spa-Da', 'Scent': 'Cinnamon', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '8 x 3.3 x 2 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '860003618998'}
This soap isn’t like most soap. It is grainy and crumbley doesn’t really lather.  It has an interesting scent.  It rises Off well and doesn’t leave a film. I don’t know it if has don’t anything to help my immunity, but I haven’t gotten sick.

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Interests:** The user's dedication to high-quality cosmetics, particularly eyeshadow palettes, has expanded to include effective self-care solutions, notably versatile oils for hair and skin. Their recent interest in hair care, specifically daily shampoos, reflects a desire for comprehensive beauty and grooming products.

- **Performance Expectations:** The user continues to prioritize efficacy, as reflected in their positive review of a recent shampoo, which highlights an appreciation for formulations that deliver visible results. This reinforces their commitment to quality in both beauty and grooming categories.

- **Sensitivity to Noise:** Comfort is paramount, with a consistent preference for products that enhance the tranquility of their self-care routine. The user seeks scents that are pleasant yet not overwhelming.

- **Functionality vs. Quality:** Their discerning approach ensures that selected products balance practical use with sensory satisfaction. The user values innovations that align with their high standards for quality and usability in both personal care and beauty.

- **Overall Experience:** The user consistently offers balanced reviews, often providing moderate ratings except for standout products. Their recent purchase underscores a growing openness to diverse self-care items, especially those that align with performance, ease of use, and comforting experiences, all aimed at enhancing relaxation and enriching their grooming and beauty journey.
